title: Academic Writing Competency Enhancement Course Utilizing Digital Collaboration Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Integration of BYOD-enabled cloud-based collaboration tools, focusing on cultivating graduate-level academic communication competencies

learning_goals: Learners can complete 80% or more of team projects across all academic writing phases (planning-drafting-revision) using collaborative platforms
Learners can provide at least three qualitative peer feedback sessions on academic writing using digital feedback tools
Learners can perform real-time collaborative writing in groups of up to five members using cloud-based document sharing systems
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
